OOC:( Real dogs and wolves see in black and white.  But a bot who 
used to see in color, may pose a problem.  This means any one wearing 
mottled camoflage can sneak up on Lunarpine, like a hunter to a dear, 
and get him.  IRL nature has little to do with being a bot.  Animal 
shape, instincts and the need to hunt are one thing.  But as far as 
the physical machanics of a BeastWars tranformer, color sight is 
superior to black and white vision. So there.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> If you're such a nature buff then you should know why Lunarpine's 
> satisfied being colorblind.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > OOC:( Oh boy, I feel sorry for you then.  I shall call you as you 
> > have requested Soulstice. I got the name for my email from the 
> > reclassification of a rabbit.  Rabbits and hares are no longer 
> > classified as rodents, but as logomorphs.  That's how I came up 
> with 
> > my email. OK, so I'm a nature buff. Sue me)
